questions.question: Just before winter, the hair on horses grows longer and thicker.  This is an example of

choices.answer: hibernation
migration
adaptation
respiration

questions.question: Some insects resemble the twigs of trees. The most probable explanation for this is that

choices.answer: the trees caused a mutation to occur
no mutations have taken place
the insects needed to camouflage themselves
natural selection has favored this trait

questions.question: One characteristic of mutations is that they usually

choices.answer: change the genetic pattern of an organism's DNA
do not happen at random
happen because an organism needs a particular trait
benefit only the organism

questions.question: The fossil record shows that most plants and animals that lived on Earth in the past

choices.answer: lived on land
are still living today
appeared about 60 million years ago
have changed over time

questions.question: Evolution can best be described as

choices.answer: a process of growth in an organism
a change in body structure after repeated use
the formation of fossils
the process of change through time

questions.question: In which type of organism would changes due to natural selection be seen most rapidly?

choices.answer: oak trees
bacteria
dogs
humans

questions.question: A trait with low survival value to the members of a population will most likely

choices.answer: undergo a series of mutations over many generations
cause the reproduction rate in those organisms to increase
decrease in frequency from one generation to the next
remain unchanged in frequency through many generations

questions.question: According to Darwin, offspring most likely to survive are those that

choices.answer: are born first and grow fastest
are best adapted to the environment
are largest and most aggressive
have no natural predators

questions.question: In an attempt to explain the diversity of living things, Darwin's theory of natural selection

choices.answer: proved how evolution took place
described how mutations produced variations
showed that only the largest animals survive
described how evolution could have occurred

questions.question: The study of fossils has allowed scientists to

choices.answer: study present ocean temperatures at different depths
analyze the chemical composition of sedimentary rocks
describe past environments and the history of life
describe the details of how life first appears on Earth
